title: Tasty Oven Roasted Chicken ( With Vegetables ) Recipe
content:
Delicious and very easy roast chicken with veggies tastes so yummy. It takes less than 10 mins to put together. Healthy chicken with veggies.

This is an easy dinner or lunch to put together. It takes less than 10 mins to put together. Once you assembled everything it takes around 40 to 45 mins to cook. The chicken is so flavourful and tastes so juicy. The chicken outside has a nice crust in them and the inside is so juicy.

 

Roast Chicken with Vegetables

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 5 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 whole chicken, cut into 12 pieces

Oil - 3 tablespoons

Carrot - 2 chopped

Cauliflower - 2 cups

Onion - 1 chopped

Potato - 1 peeled and cubed

Garlic - 10 cloves with skins on

 

FOR SPICE MIX:

Red Chilli Flakes - 1 tablespoon

Chilli Powder or Paprika - 1 tablespoon

Salt - 1 tablespoon

Parsley - 2 tablespoons

Oregano - 1 tablespoon

Sumac - 2 tablespoons

 

Instructions

Preheat oven to 200 degrees C. Mix spice mix together and set aside.

Take veggies in a baking pan. Add spice mix and oil and toss well.

Place chicken over it and sprinkle with spice mix and oil and mix well.

Pop it in the oven and bake for 35 to 45 mins.

Remove and serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
recommendations.content:
The spicy and flavourful chicken curry which is made using some spicy toasted spice powders. The ghee adds a nice flavor to the chicken curry. So good.
 
Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 45 mins
Total time: 55 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Cantonese Chicken Recipe
recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
